entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016
